title: The creatures you meet at the bar
description: The Creatures you meet at the bar is one of the greatest books of all time. With a comedic twist to those that you meet when you are out at the bar or club that includes the Bouncer/Door Guy, Lifer, Gold Digger, Old Man Creeper, and many many more fun and exciting creatures that you encounter on your night out.
author: Richart Ruddie
